situated.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to be in a particular place or position
situated.translation[1].definitions[0].e: We stayed in a small town situated just south of Cleveland.
All the apartments are beautifully situated overlooking the beach.
situated.translation[1].definitions[1].d: to be in a good or bad situation
situated.translation[1].definitions[1].e: Microsoft is well situated to exploit this new market.
